title: Use distributive property
text: Use distributive property to rewrite the expression $$\frac{48y^4-24y^3}{\left(-8y^2\right)}=\frac{48y^4}{\left(-8y^2\right)}-\frac{24y^3}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$
speech: Use distributive property to rewrite the expression  fraction, 48 y to the fourth, minus 24 y cubed, over, parentheses, negative 8 y squared, ,  is equal to fraction, 48 y to the fourth, over, parentheses, negative 8 y squared, ,  minus fraction, 24 y cubed, over, parentheses, negative 8 y squared, ,
pacedSpeech: Use distributive property to rewrite the expression  this expression

title: Use distributive property
text: As a reminder, the distributive law states $$\left(a-b\right) c=a c-b c$$
speech: As a reminder, the distributive law states  parentheses a minus b,  times c is equal to, a c minus b c
pacedSpeech: As a reminder, the distributive law states    a minus b,  times c is equal to, a c minus b c

title: Use distributive property
text: in this case, we can see divided by $$\left(-8y^2\right)$$ same as multiply by $$\frac{1}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$, $$a=48y^4$$ , $$b=24y^3$$, $$c=\frac{1}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$
speech: in this case, we can see divided by  parentheses, negative 8 y squared,   same as multiply by  fraction, 1 over, parentheses, negative 8 y squared, ,  ,  a is equal to, 48 y to the fourth,  ,  b is equal to, 24 y cubed, ,  c is equal to fraction, 1 over, parentheses, negative 8 y squared, ,

title: Simplify each term in expression
text: As a reminder, the power rule states for any integer $$m$$, $$n$$ and real number a, $$\frac{a^m}{a^n}=a^{m-n}$$
speech: As a reminder, the power rule states for any integer  m ,  n  and real number a,  fraction, a to the m-th, over, a to the n-th,  is equal to, a raised to the m minus n power
pacedSpeech: As a reminder, the power rule states for any integer   m
and real number a,   fraction, a to the m-th, over, a to the n-th,  is equal to, a raised to the m minus n power

title: Combine the simplified terms
text: As our last step, we can put the simplified terms back to the expression $$\frac{48y^4}{\left(-8y^2\right)}-\frac{24y^3}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$

subHints.title: Combine the simplified terms
subHints.text: in the expression $$\frac{48y^4}{\left(-8y^2\right)}-\frac{24y^3}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$, replace $$\frac{48y^4}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$ with $$-6y^2$$, and replace $$\frac{24y^3}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$ with $$-3y$$ then we yield a new expression
